items.sentence: Tom told me that I shouldn\'t be doing this.
Tom could smell the wet dog across the room.
Tom won\'t leave until he\'s talked to Mary.

Mary picked a flower and put it in her hair.
Mary wanted to know if Tom had a girlfriend.
Most people around here have no electricity.
My father could swim well when he was young.
I use flashcards to study French vocabulary.
I used to think Tom was a pretty good coach.
We need to stop Tom before he hurts himself.
